title: Therapy Planet No. 13 - Novel Updates
tags: Calm Protagonist   Cold Protagonist   Futuristic Setting   Military   Outer Space   Psychic Powers   Transformation Ability
author: Ji Ling Chao   记今朝
description:
A Federation Colonel with abnormal thoughts was locked in a dark room and met a little looney. 

“Your whole body emits a scent that I dread (covet) and fear (desire).” 

A frigid Colonel X little looney roommate: A sweet story of interstellar travel>
